Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44716 affecting package kube-vip-cloud-provider for versions less than 0.0.2-16
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-44716 affecting package kube-vip-cloud-provider for versions less than 0.0.2-16. A patched version of the package is available.
